title: Max Verstappen reacts to Christian Horner's Red Bull F1 exit
summary: Max Verstappen has now had his say after Red Bull confirmed his former F1 boss had left the team

qa_pairs.question: Who is the current driver for Red Bull Racing known for multiple championship wins?
What role did Christian Horner hold at Red Bull Racing before his exit?
In what year did Max Verstappen win his first Formula 1 World Championship?
